snippet.title: PEPPERED Trailer
snippet.description:
PEPPERED is an existential, narrative-driven platformer. 

You play as a nameless civilian of an immortal world an hour before a return of the God of Death. Life presents you with an opportunity to take this matter into your own hands. And then presents you with countless ways to fail miserably.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PepperedGame
